pullRequest.title: Do not use Spring Boot component scan for creating beans
pullRequest.bodyText:
The file based registry, the Mongo DB registry and the Device Connection
service now create service bean instances explicitly in a central place
which makes it easier to understand what's actually
happening.

commit.message:
Do not use Spring Boot component scan for creating beans

The file based registry, the Mongo DB registry and the Device Connection
service now create service bean instances explicitly in a central place
which makes it easier to understand what's actually
happening.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText: You can leave out the value =  part, as this is the default name and can be omitted.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -36,10 +36,9 @@ * The application implements Hono's * Device Connection API. */ -@ComponentScan("org.eclipse.hono.deviceconnection.infinispan") @ComponentScan("org.eclipse.hono.service.auth") @ComponentScan("org.eclipse.hono.service.metric") -@Configuration +@Import(value = { ApplicationConfig.class, EmbeddedCacheConfig.class, RemoteCacheConfig.class })
